description: Fresh bombardments were reported within hours of Azerbaijan and Armenia declaring a ceasefire.
title: Armenia Azerbaijan: Reports of fresh shelling dent ceasefire hopes
title_page: Armenia Azerbaijan: Reports of fresh shelling dent ceasefire hopes - BBC News
maintext: About 70,000 people have been displaced in the latest escalation, officials say. The long-running conflict has simmered ever since the war in the 1990s, when ethnic Armenians - the majority in the territory - broke away from Azerbaijan. Thousands of Azeris were expelled then.
